name: Tetris Platformer - Alpha ver.
description:
In Tetris-Platformer, you play as a platformer character, sucked into an arcade machine. With the parallel gameplay of both traditional Tetris and a platformer, you'll need to resolve some crazy Tetris levels. 

Use the A & D keys to control the Platformer-Character, the keyboard arrows to control the Tetris Bricks and the Space bar to jump / rapidly drop the bricks.

This is an early build of the game, so please try it and let us know what you think
